mapper.insert: insert into HUDH_DZBL_DETAIL (id, title, blfl,bc, detail,createtime,status,blcode,creator,sstype,organization) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.blfl, a.bc, a.detail ,a.createtime ,a.status,a.blcode,a.creator,b.user_name as username,a.sstype from HUDH_DZBL_DETAIL a left join sys_person b on a.creator = b.seq_id where a.blcode=#{blcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.createtime desc
